title: Fosar&Bludorf-Status nicht existent(antigravity,space defense,st
description:
For english-only speaking:
This book is in german language. English title would be: Status non-existent - Antigravity deployed, space defense, stealth technology, mind control (2008). Grazyna Fosar and Franz Bludorf explain why the knowledge of antigravity never came to public arena as those who have discovered it made damn sure to keep it away from everyone else. Did you know that some secret military bases in Australia were actually built for space defense? But against whom? If you want to develop futuristic space weapon systems it is necessary to develop a new enemy who comes from outer space to justify all the enormous financial spending. Whether this enemy is real or not it's not so important as longer you can keep the population in an endless state of fear. Can cosmic communication be achieved with hexagonal antenna systems? Find out how technologies already exist that could dissolve us from addiction to fossil fuels. Also includes American study for space defense and former "eyes only" study of British military intelligence service DI55 dealing with UFOs over Great Britain. 170 pages, many pictures.
